Player History
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/3/1986 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/3/1988, off Dwight Gooden (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/1988, off Lee Smith (MON)...
Traded from Philadelphia to Pittsburgh on 7/5/1990 (Going to PIT: 1B Ricky Jordan. Going to PHI: RF Joe Orsulak)...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
